단체복
음산한 제복 {colour_start|stun}"더럽고 너덜너덜하다., 야생의 가혹함으로 명품화 됨."{colour_end}
훈련용 제복 {colour_start|stun}"모든 그림자에는 시발점이 있다."{colour_end}
거대한 그늘 갑옷 {colour_start|stun}"좋은 선생의 자부심."{colour_end}
명품 그늘 갑옷 {colour_start|stun}"클랜이 가졌던 최고 중 하나."{colour_end}
"빛나는 어둠" {colour_start|stun}"빛과 어둠을 구체화했다. 유령의 진실된 상징."{colour_end}
차크람 & 단검
녹슬고 부서진 무기 {colour_start|stun}"모든 초보자들이 겪어야 될 일."{colour_end}
무딘 칼날 {colour_start|stun}"결국엔 날카롭게 벼리는 법을 배우게 될 것이다."{colour_end}
수리된 날카로운 칼 {colour_start|stun}"적절한 무기란 이렇게 생긴 것."{colour_end}
벼려진 칼 {colour_start|stun}"빛나는 날카로움으로 준비 된 날으는 황금 단두대."{colour_end}
"대천사" {colour_start|stun}"그들은 항상 전할 것이 있다."{colour_end}
유령은 많은 무기를 예술적으로 다루는 전문가 입니다, 유럽의 서쪽과 동쪽 모두를 여행하며 배운 모든 기술들은 자신만의 기술로 만들었습니다. 그는 숨어서 공격을 준비하거나 전열의 적들을 추방 해 버리거나 교란시킵니다. 전투의 예술적 탁월함 외엔, 약점을 찾아내는 좋은 시야와 동료들이 기꺼이 협조 하는 한 신성한 힘을 이끌어 낼 수 있습니다.
유령은 날카롭고 신속한 것을 중요시합니다, 무기와 생김새 양쪽 다 말이죠. 그는 배경과 어우러지며 단검이 더러운 육체를 잘라내어 번뜩일때만 발견할 수 있습니다.
이 환상적인 남자는 야영의 때가 오면 동료들을 보살핍니다...자기 방식대로 말이죠. 동료들은 유령과 견해가 같다면 더 지원을 잘 받을 수 있으며 원정대가 특별한 도움이 필요 없다면, 그는 자신의 장비와 기술들을 벼려낼 것입니다.
휴대용 맹독
휴대용 맹독
유령의 무기에 산성독을 바르는 데 사용됩니다. 공격할 때 마다 닳습니다.

독이 발렸을 때:
살아있는 그림자
이자는 들어오는 법과 신속하고 조용하고 공손하게 떠나는 법을 안다. 그는 재능을 증명하기 위해 이 좁은 영지에 박혀있었고 이제 영지에 도사린 공포를 정화할 것을 제안한다.

응급 처치
아플진 몰라도, 결국 피는 네 몸속에 있을거야.
그래 미안, 입 좀 다물고 스스로 좀 참아 봐.
내가 해야 할 일은 칼을 덥히는거야. 다른 건 너희 손에 달린거라고.
고해 성사
빛이 저와 함께하매. "나에게 죄를 고하거라, 형제들이여."
"그분의 짐을 진실로 생각하고 용서를 받으시라 하시매."
난 한때 어린양이였지, 결국 버텨냈지만. 네 죄를 말해 봐.
격려
... 그리고 우리가 광휘의 시대를 이끌게 될꺼야!
... 빛으로 심연을 잘라내버리자!
우리가 어둠 속에 머물지라도, 항상 빛은 있는 법.
전술적 접근
우리 전적을 살펴보고, 내가 작전을 좀 그려봤는데...
앞으로 있을 거짓에 대한 계획이 좀 있는데, 잘 들어봐...
... 그림자 속에 누워있을꺼야, 하지만 걱정마, 난 언제나 기습하니까!
가죽 덧대기
갑옷 안에 넣어 둬. 몇방 좀 맞아 줄 꺼야.
중갑이나 경갑에, 이 작은것들이 탄력을 더해줄거야.
네 망또 안에 받쳐 입어. 나중에 고마워 해도 돼.
적들의 힘을 생각했을 때 얼마 안가겠지만, 네 목숨을 살려줄꺼야.
내가 그림자에 통달하기 전에는, 그게 내 제일 친한 친구였지. 입어 둬.
누가 바느질이 전투에서 쓸모 없는거라 했어?
훈련
흠, 오늘 밤엔 뭘 할까? 시야? 민첩성? 듣기?
걱정하지 마. 내가 사라질 지 몰라도 항상 여기 있을 거니까.
난 내 자유시간 때 칼을 삼키곤 해. 안타깝게도 전투에서 쓸만한 건 아니지.
결정력... 판단력... 내 생각엔 이런 상황에서도 할 수 있을 것 같아.
흠... 야근도 훈련으로 치지, 다방면에서 말이야!
맹독 만들기
유독 식물과 독 있는 생물, 우린 서로를 잘 알지.
한때는 뱀이였지만, 지금은 맹독이 됐지.
독사, 개구리, 버섯... 자연이 내려준 병기창이지.
이거 어떻게 쓰는지 모르겠는데.
이런거 써본 적 없는데…
이거 무슨 독 같은거야?
조금이라도 흘리면... 아아악!! 타들어 간다!
무기에 독을 발랐다!
중독 될 각오 해.
농축된 독.
난 독을 품진 않았지만, 내 무기는…
더 치명적이게 됐지.
내 송곳니는 준비됐다고!
*속삭임* 그림자 같이 유연하게.
속삭임 같이 빠르게.
태양빛 사이로 미끄러지기.
*속삭임* 빠르고 치명적이게!
깜빡였어.
딴데 봐, 나 죽었어...
좋은 암살자는 죽지 않는다. 다만 사라질 뿐이다...
내가..사라진다…
내가... 사라져..?
이 감정... 지난번 처럼...!
오.. 두려움... 잃어버린 내 오래된 적수여.
이-이럴 순 없어! 내 이런걸 느껴선 안된다고!
아직 아니야... 아직 나는 이게 터져나가는게 느껴져.
내 감각이...! 다들! 나한테서 꺼져!
아! 교회를 파멸시킬 지어다, 너희 모두가!
너희 모두를 광신도 먹이로 줘버렸어야 했어!
이단이다! 신성 모독하는 추종자들! 금지시켜라!
나는 너희가 형태없는 괴물들이라 선언하노라!
좋아, 얼마나 많은 이가 부정한거야? 이물들? 피빨이들?
무한한 무능력!
왜 내 지시를 따르지 않는거야? 우리 꼴 좀 봐!
어디서 그딴식으로 싸우는걸 배운거야? 서커스?
니가 하는 모든걸 내가 10는 더 잘하겠다!
어떻게 단 한명도 자기 역할을 제대로 하는 놈이 없어!
난 고통을 견뎌내도록 훈련받았지... 잘 못 만든거야.
내 몸을 거쳐간건 셀 수 없을 정도지만 더 거쳐갔으면 좋겠어!
아직 내 혈관에 피가 흐른다고? 내게 보여주게 친구여.
피 흘리는 것은 거룩함의 과시다!
내 감각은 시험받아야 해! 피로 둘러싼...내 감각이!
넌 지금 다양한 무술의 대가를 보고있는거야!
뭐라고? 나보다 검의 예술에 대해 잘 아는 사람은 없다고!
진짜 전문가가 일을 하게 좀 냅둬, 응?
두려워 마라, 쓸모없는 동료들이여. 난 눈 깜짝할 새 저놈들을 죽일 수 있어!
넌 내가 모두를 구하는거나 쳐다보고 있으라고... 또 말이지.
전투에서 내 전문성을 확인 해 보고 싶다고? 뭐, 어찌됐건 보여 주지.
이걸 해낼 수 있다고 생각 한 내가 바보지.
희망이 멀어져 간다. 내 형제들의 숨결처럼.
가망없어... 그는 벌써 죽었을 거야... 죽었다고.
형제들, 내가 해냈어! 나 좀 봐! 나도 너 처럼 교회의 도구가 됐다고!
날. 막지. 마!~ 죽여주는 시간을 보내고 있다고!
위대한 빛, 위대한 그림자! 절대 잊지마!
난 너의 이해를 초월한 무언가다!
포도주, 그 포도주, 아니, 포도주? 저 포도주, 끝없는...!
오늘 쓰러지기를 거부한다!
죽음이여 언제든 나에게 오소서! 자신 있다면!
비가 온 뒤에 하늘은 맑아진다, 앞으로 돌격!
난 아무것도 안하려고 멀리서 온게 아니라고!
이 비밀에 감춰진 사내는 누구인가?
내가 어둠에 뛰어든 까닭은 빛과 함께하려 함이라!
단검의 빛나는 끝이 되게 하소서!
나는 용이자, 범이자, 독사다... 난 너희보다 더 위대하다!
날개의 비명소리가 멈추자, 내가 돌아왔다!
저 괴물들은 우리 영혼의 강함을 견뎌낼 수 없어.
내 마음은 깨끗하고, 내 몸은 빛을 느낀다. 이제 공격해.
나는 혼돈 끝자락에 다다랐다. 형제들이여, 칼을 침착하게 다뤄야 해.
잘 들어 친구들! 내 특별한 비밀들을 보여주도록 하지.
난 성화처럼 타오르는 눈길로 저들의 약점을 비추지.
아, 많은 해가 흘렀어도 매의 가르침이 내 안에 있구나..
우린 개개인이 훌륭하지, 함께라면 우린 막을 수 없어!
내 칼은 당신것이오, 빛줄기 같이!
저 숨어있는 파멸자들을 찢어버리자!
내 곁에 있어라, 형제들이여! 함께라면 우린 정복할 수 있다!
네 영혼과 무기를 공명시켜라!
적절한 재생... 내 몸이 이상하게 날뛰는군.
빛이 내 피를 정화하고 내가 외치자 허물을 벗노라!
너는 벌써 죽은걸 또 죽일 수 없어!
난 잊을 수 없는 환영이다! 너의 유령 악몽이다!
난 개인적인 볼일이 있고 넌 날 막을 수 없지!
난 그분을 위해 인내 할 것이다!
유령의 의지는 꺾이지 않는다!
지금 상황에서 칼을 들어올릴 수 있다면, 여전히 공격 할 수 있어!
생명의 숨결 하나에, 서 있는 이 하나!
여기, 모든 것을 꿰뚫어 보는 매의 눈!
달리는 치타처럼 숨쉬고, 황소처럼 돌진하라.
하나되어 싸우라!
복수심에 불타는 영혼처럼 달려들어!
난 아직 이 저주를 축복으로 바꿀 수 있어!
뭐지? 무슨 유령이라도 본 것처럼 구네!
만약에... 저들처럼 된다면?
울음소리...! 저들의 울음소리가, 저주받은 바이올린같아!
내 형제들처럼 간단하게 짐승처럼 나자빠진다면...
내 형제가 소멸되기 전에 느꼈던 것이 이것인가?
난 영웅으로 죽지 않겠지, 내가 원하는 만큼 오래살면 안될까...?
신성모독적인 부패한 살덩이 냄새가 난다!
이런 상황을 겪어봤지, 배신자들 위주로 돌아가게 두지 않겠어
난 신성한 속삭임을 들었어, 날 반역자에게 인도 해 주실거야.
마음대로 해 봐라, 아무도 유령을 잡는데 성공한 적 없어!
Heh, I knew there was something shady about you.
찬란한 진홍빛 색채여! 한번 더 봐야겠구나!
네 살속에 있는 맹독의 소리를 듣게 해 줘!

너한테는 너무 많은 노력이 들어.

The Phantom is a specialist in many weapons arts, having travelled to the west of Europe and all the way across to the east he mixes the different techniques into his own style. He may use stealth to set up an attack or to vanish right in front of his foes, confusing them. Besides his prowess in the art of combat, he has a good eye to spot weaknesses in a team and is also capable of pulling out some divine favors so long as his allies are willing to cooperate for the price.

The Phantom values swiftness in his equipment as well as sharpness, in both weapons and looks. He must be able to blend in with the scenery and only reveal himself when the glint of his daggers has already cut through impure flesh.

When this illusive man has time to settle down he can attend to his companions' care… in his own way. Allies that share his views with him may get the Phantom more inclined to support them and if the group doesn't need any special care, then the Phantom may reserve some time to hone his own skills or equipment.

CAUTERIZE
It may hurt, but at least your blood will stay within you.
Yeah sorry, please keep this cloth in your mouth and hold yourself still.

CONFESS THY SINS
The Light is One with me. "Confess thy sins to me, brethren."
"Be sincere to thy burden and forgiven thou shalt be."
I used to be a deacon, you could say, but I still hold permission for this. Tell me your burden.
COMMUNION
... and may us usher in an Age of Brilliance!
... let us cut through the Abyss with beams of light!
In the dark we may dwell, but always serving the Light.
TACTICAL APPROACH
Given our past encounters, I have turned my observations into this sketch...
I have a plan for what lies ahead, listen carefuly...
... I'll be lying in the shadows, but don't worry, I'll always strike!
LEATHER PATCHES
Put these under your armor. They'll ease up a few blows.
Be it light or heavy armor, these little things will make you more resilient.
Wear these under your robes. You may thank me later.
Given our foes these might not last long, but they can save your life.

TRAINING
Hmm what will it be tonight? Sight? Dexterity? Hearing?

Decisions, decisions... I think I could work on this, given our surroundings.
Hmm... working the night shift also counts as training, multidisciplinary even!

Poisonous flora and venomous creatures, we know each other well.
Once you're used to snakes, they become living bottles of venom.
Serpents, frogs, mushrooms... they're nature's gifts to my arsenal.
I don't know how to use this.

Prepare for blight.

I am not venomous, my weapons however…

My fangs are ready!
*whispering* Swift as a shadow.
Quick like a whisper.
I slide between sunbeams.
*whispering* Quick and deadly!

Why? I am out of time.
I am sorry. I have failed you all as I have failed my brother.
Only fate will tell, not you! Not anyone!
The mantis awaits for the perfect strike!
Hush! The moon hasn't spoken yet!
No, no! I must strike at the sound of flapping wings!
Strange...! No signs of drums yet.
I know exactly what to do! Save your breath, traitor!
I won't be sent to reckless death!
You think I am surrounded but I am in every shadow you see!
I shall give you a demonstration of the Left Hand of the Light!
Everyone is on their own now!
My blades, my will!
Barely any blood spilled. Come on now, fiends!
Maybe I'll catch your interest if we make this a competition?
I am curious to know which other organs I might lose?
No improvement comes without pain!
Make your move, oafs! I promise I won't hide!
Ahh... I needed this more than anything!
I must take matters with my own hands, if I am to survive.
It was past time I acted to cut this team's foolishness.
Just do this! It's that simple!
Allow me to offer a better alternative...
Out of my way! Or you'll face my blades as well!
How many times must I tell you to follow my lead? Like this?!
You're dealing with a professional holy assassin, what else would you want?
Just copy me! My stance, my swings, and we will survive!
This is what decades of training looks like.
I am no mere mercenary and I'll make this clear.
I feel trapped in uncertainty...
I will take the plunge into nothingness...!
I have been in the dark for so long, I should be used to it.
My brother... We never had a chance to talk since my return.
I wonder if he watches over me, but I have never felt his presence.
A dice roll! A dice roll!
This is an old technique passed down my bloodline! Watch!
Hey, who said rogues always come from poor families?
Don't look at me like that, you lack manners!
Look how I strike! Look! Are you proud of me, brother?
I can sense his malevolence! The smell of burning flesh on the accursed pyre!
Are my eyes deceiving me? I am the only shadow supposed to move!
I... I thought I saw an amalgamation of corpses walking there.
If you take too long I'll extinguish this fire now.
Don't be loud! Trying to attract attention, eh?
I should vanish to ensure the secrecy of my position.
If only a burning needle and thicker threads were compatible!
I should practice flagellation with red hot flails!
The only thing that hurts me at this point is the holy flame!
How come you haven't died of indigestion yet? This looks awful.
...? Do you call this "curry"?
I have endured longer travels! Camping now is so premature!
We absolutely had to camp, my blades needed it!
Foolish are those who don't travel light. I have everything in a small sack.
I am a busy man on a holy quest, surely you can handle the night shifts just this one time.
These flames only remind me of the inevitable fate that awaits me.
What is there to know about a damned one like me?
I can only look forward to a reunion in the afterlife.
Would anyone like to see my scars?
Do you think the language of bloodsuckers is made up of buzzwords?
Toss me unto the Abyss and I will become it!
Have you ever tried to catch a ghost? Well, here's your chance!
My body has always been frail, break me in half!
End this image.
I think I have been sent to my death, so be it.
HAHAHA! THE LIGHT! YES!
Rapiers, longswords, halberds, daggers, rusty knives! I take them all!
As you deserve!
You won't interfere in my quest!
I will knock some sense onto you!
Watch where you swing that thing!
I should be able to go through your body, watch!
Donate your flesh and organs to me!
Why do I have to do everything myself, including this?
No! The ribs! Right here!
Only I can take myself down, it seems...
The ritual doesn't seem to have a counter, does it?
There's some loose skin I should take off!
Could there be insects gestating inside me?
No, we all die together!
I am dragging you heretics with me!
Retreat? To where?
It all ends here. We have to make room for new, better heroes in the roster.
There hasn't been enough bloodshed yet!
What do you mean? I am just getting started!
I left my oven on!
Why leave? This is the perfect spot for star gazing!
Not this! Not again!
How...? How did they catch me?!
I refuse to fall because of you all!
I can smell betrayal! My wrath knows no bounds!
Team! Where's my team?! I NEED HEALING!
I have saved your behinds countless times! Where's the gratitude?
Finally! You caught me! Now do it again!
Try to strike the other side of my face! To keep it even!
Locusts will come forth from the depths of my wounds!
You're playing with the heir of the west's throne! I must usurp it!
Was it luck or a play of fate?
This only grows worse the longer we drag this!
Hah! Good thing the conspirators are a bunch of amateurs!
Quantity over quality I see!
Oh, for the Light's sake!
I see you like teasing...!
Ah, the winds of change!
Which would you rather meet? A phantasm or an alien?
Quite below average, but now someone else can finish it, I guess.
Ah yes, you're welcome. Since, you know, they were distracted by me.
Barely a scratch, but at least you got the right one.
That was sheer dumb luck and you know it.
Oh wait, are we doing target practice?!
No! Smack them with a book! Educate the ruffians!
This is a sign! Heed it!
The alliance is so obvious it hurts.
I see exactly what is going on.
That's how you die.
That is also how others end up dead.
You all can thank me later for your lives.
The stance! The lack of focus! Have you not been watching me?
Burn the nest! Burn it all!
The wind now blows to the opposite direction!
Don't tell me your legs are failing you too?!
I can't drag anyone's corpse back to the hamlet!
Ohh now you're pretending to be enemies... ok.
... Please strike one another a bit too hard for one to fall unconscious.
Wow, what a lucky fellow!
I can hear the angels singing in awe! If only they were about me!
Weeding out the weak, I see.
Smart, they can see the easy prey.
Hey! I command you not to get hit! Or you're it!
Caw, caw! The crows approach!
Why do I have the impression they won't miss me when they strike?
They'll definitely take better aim when coming for me!
And I talk to myself at night because I can't forget!
Ah yes, I see you have been chosen as well!
No! I am fine here!
Ask someone else, I am trying to hold myself together!
... You know my answer.
I will just ignore you from now on.
And miss the opportunity of a good strike? I think not.
This is MY spot! It was made for me and my blood.
Hmph...
Shut it and let me work!
Oh is this some kind of a game? Tell me the rules first.
I see I am back at the castle!
No sunlight for me, I am afraid! No, no I am just albino!
This is getting real tired, really fast.
It is clear your actions mean nothing to me!
That depends, will you hit me?
A new wound is worth a thousand bandages!
Hah, your actions are noble, but they won't help me.
Let this be a test to myself. Save your efforts.
Shades can't use items, silly!
Nonsense! Ghosts can't fall sick!
You think I'm unaware of your intentions?
I know how to heal myself, mind your own business!
You thought someone who uses venom on a daily basis wouldn't be able to recognize it?
Just hold it for a little while longer, please!
I appreciate the gesture, but this feeling is divine!
Allow me to enjoy it for a couple more rounds, yes?
A waste of talent, really.
Let me suffer, it is well deserved.
Don't force my blade onto you for the right of self-deprecation.
Shhh, shhh! Your glowing bits will give away my position!
What? I have eaten already!
The wisp which whispers needs no listeners!
I said NO!
Next time, I'll be shutting your mouth with my dagger.
... Begone!
I refuse! The more challenging a struggle, the more satisfying are the wounds!
I am fine without them, have fun!
My blood is tainted and it has to leave my body!
Leave me alone, help someone else!
... Please leave me be.
Can't anyone be left alone with their dark thoughts anymore?
Stay away from the wine! And the boo juice!
I am already a complex being! I need no more strikes from the ones above!
If we master the stars, we master immortality!
Surprised?
Keep your eyes open next time!
Hmm, too bad you blinked again!
Don't mind the sting, it means the cleansing is working.
You can run, you can hide, you can pray... but I'll cut you down.
I am the morning star!
People fear the unknown for a reason!
Heh... Purification in progress.
What a horrible night to have a curse!
Shouldn't have left that neck exposed.
No! Stay away from me! I need... solitude!
Allow me to help myself before I can help you... !
Leave me be! I can't help you now...
After all that's happened you still insist? BEGONE!
Oh, now you need my assistance? Bah!
You can keep guessing my tricks, there's no fun in sharing them.
Do you have a flail to share instead?
Hmm, I could use a training partner instead...
Where are the vile serpents when one needs them?!
That would be too much effort for the likes of you.
Try handling things yourself... just once, in your life.
Refusing to help may be frowned upon, but hey, I am no saint.
You broke my concentration.
You need MORE help? From ME? The hero needs his rest!
Only if you donate 35% of your earnings to the church.
As if it would be of any help...
I've done terrible things... Have I been fooled by the church...?
Why seek help from a failure?
Little do they know... I am immune to stakes!
I am the ghost with the most!
Haha... Hahaha, oh what? I'm too busy now!
And poison me to the very core?
I've handled snakes worse than you!
Spare me the chitter-chatter, I see you crystal clear.
I will accept molten metal instead.
No, none of that! But do stab me between these two ribs!
I wish to relive the pain of getting half of my face torn apart, please?
You want me to trust your "skills"? After all that crude display?
No, thanks. I am allergic to incompetence.
You'll taint the sancticity of my robes, stay away!
Worry not for me. I am damned beyond salvation.
You should save your talents to real humans.
Just leave me be. If you knew what is under the mask...
Hmm! I can smell the poison!
What a curious secret ingredient! Hah, I've done that before.
Fasting plays a part in strength!
It feels better when the pain comes from the insides, yes!
It looks good, but I am not in the mood for it.
You may have my share.
There is a mosquito in it! There is a tick on your head!
I can smell the blood in it! I am in a low iron diet at the moment!
